description:
Futa Kaminoshima (神ノ島 風太 Kaminoshima Futa) is a first-year university student taking up Literature and the vocalist/saxophonist of the band Fujin RIZING!.
The young man who was raised under the Nagasaki Sun as a honest boy. He cares deeply for his childhood friends Aoi Wakakusa, Misaki Goto and Kohei Hayasaka, as well as Tokyo born Yamato Tsubaki, as part of Fujin RIZING!. Positively innocent with a knack of getting into trouble due to his outrageous behavior. He smiles a lot and cries a lot. People say that he is similar to the sun: able to make people smile with wonder. His partner is a Saxophone he calls "Sakutaro".
name: Kaminoshima Futa
